bingo.goal_emote: Find one of the global Twitch emotes

form.title: Create bingo
form.description: Let your viewers guess a number or an emote
form.number_info: Your viewers will have to send a number between the min and max values (included) in the chat
form.emote_info: Your viewers will have to send one of the {COUNT} global twitch emotes on your chat (smileys excluded)
form.custom_info: Your viewers will have to send the following message
